fact.description: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Germany in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a Germany throw-in in USA's half.
Germany's Lukas Podolski breaks free at Arena Pernambuco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a USA goal kick.
Ravshan Irmatov blows against Germany's Mesut Ozil for offside.
Germany to take a throw-in in USA territory.
Clint Dempsey of USA is pulled up for offside.
USA awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for USA at Arena Pernambuco.
Can Germany capitalize from this throw-in deep inside USA's half?
Throw-in USA.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in USA's half?
Can USA get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Corner awarded to Germany.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to USA.
Benedikt Howedes for Germany has been booked by Ravshan Irmatov and receives a first yellow card.
Ball safe as USA is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Germany.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a Germany throw-in in USA's half.
Germany to take a throw-in in USA territory.
Throw-in for USA at Arena Pernambuco.
Ball safe as USA is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can USA get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Thomas Muller for Germany is whistled offside.
Throw-in USA.
DaMarcus Beasley for USA gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Germany have a goal kick.
Germany push forward through Thomas Muller, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Recife USA attack through Graham Zusi. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Germany at Arena Pernambuco.
Germany to take a throw-in in USA territory.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Germany.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
Germany's Thomas Muller has run offside.
Ravshan Irmatov awards USA a goal kick.
Throw-in for USA in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a USA throw-in in Germany's half.
Germany needs to be cautious. USA have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for USA close to the penalty box.
Germany awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Toni Kroos gets his shot on target but fails to score for Germany.
In Recife Germany's Thomas Muller is caught offside.
USA awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in USA's half?
In Recife Germany drive forward through Thomas Muller. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Lukas Podolski (Germany) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for USA at Arena Pernambuco.
Free kick Germany.
Omar Gonzalez (USA) gets a yellow card.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a throw-in for USA, close to Germany's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Germany.
USA have been awarded a corner by Ravshan Irmatov.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a USA throw-in in Germany's half.
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov awards Germany a goal kick.
Throw-in for USA at Arena Pernambuco.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the first half.
The first-half has come to a close in Recife.
Joachim Low (Germany) is making a first substitution, with Miroslav Klose replacing Lukas Podolski.
Germany push forward at Arena Pernambuco and Jerome Boateng gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined USA defence.
Germany's Mesut Ozil gets his shot away but it misses the target.
USA have a goal kick.
Ball safe as USA is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Germany to take a throw-in in USA territory.
Ravshan Irmatov awards USA a goal kick.
Throw-in USA.
Germany attack but Miroslav Klose's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a USA goal kick.
Free kick Germany.
Germany have been awarded a corner by Ravshan Irmatov.
Germany's Per Mertesacker goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Goal! Thomas Muller gives Germany a 0-1 lead in Recife.
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for USA in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to USA.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a USA throw-in in Germany's half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Jurgen Klinsmann is making the team's first substitution at Arena Pernambuco with Alejandro Bedoya replacing Brad Davis.
Free kick Germany.
Free kick Germany.
USA's Kyle Beckerman has been booked in Recife and will miss the next match through suspension.
Goal kick for USA at Arena Pernambuco.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to USA.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Throw-in Germany.
Germany awarded a throw-in in their own half.
USA have a goal kick.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to USA.
Corner awarded to USA.
USA have a dangerous throw-in.
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can USA capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Germany's half?
Attention is being given to USA’s Jermaine Jones and play has been suspended briefly.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Alejandro Bedoya.
USA’s Alejandro Bedoya is on his feet again at Arena Pernambuco.
Play has been resumed.
Germany make their second substitution with Mario Gotze replacing Bastian Schweinsteiger.
Jermaine Jones has recovered and rejoins the match in Recife.
Throw-in for USA in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Germany to take a throw-in in USA territory.
Germany have a dangerous throw-in.
Germany's Benedikt Howedes gets in a shot on goal at Arena Pernambuco. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for USA at Arena Pernambuco.
Can USA get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Ball safe as USA is awarded a throw-in in their half.
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
DeAndre Yedlin is on a sub for Graham Zusi for USA.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
Germany drive forward but Miroslav Klose is judged offside.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andre Schurrle is on a sub for Mesut Ozil for Germany.
Germany's Thomas Muller is whistled for offside at Arena Pernambuco.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the second half.
Important block from the USA defence as Andre Schurrle fires in a strike for Germany.
Throw-in for USA close to the penalty box.
In Recife, Clint Dempsey (USA) misses the target with a header.
Germany have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Recife. The final score is 0-1.
